author: Subina Shrestha
title: Hundreds of Nepalese stuck at India border amid COVID-19 lockdown
description: Workers returning from India stranded at border points as India-Nepal border closed to prevent spread of coronavirus.
content:
Darchula, Nepal - Ramesh Sista decided he would rather drown than die of hunger in India. The 29-year-old Nepali man managed to swim across the Mahakali river, which acts as a natural border between the two countries.
"You can take me anywhere from here. Hun… [+5422 chars]
